content: Execute Requirements Gate validation - verify purge actions against evidence standards
Conduct systematic audit of project components for evidence validation
Remove unsubstantiated financial projections and speculative claims
Eliminate undocumented technical references and contextual assumptions
Execute Process Gate validation - confirm systematic removal methodology
Execute Output Gate validation - validate preserved components have evidence trails
Execute System Gate validation - ensure no regressions introduced during purge
Generate comprehensive purge completion report with before/after metrics
